messages.body: $AAPL Apple's latest App Store data reveals a surprising number of medical professionals using medical apps. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-making-big-inroads-in-medical-app-space/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Making Big Inroads In Medical App Space
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is intent on making a major splash in the medical world, and the latest App Store data reveals it's already doing just that. The Verge has more details on just how far the App Store has come in that past 10 years: ResearchKit and CareKit, Apple's software tools for doctors and medical researchers, are getting used in clinical trials for conditions including physical therapy, Parkinson's disease, and autism.

links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.
